DOC.brief_summary: Arthroscopic transosseous fixation rotator cuff tear become alternative arthroscopic suture anchor . This novel technique allow surgeon perform standardize arthroscopic transosseous ( anchor free ) repair rotator cuff tear improve postoperative pain reduce incidence shoulder stiffness . The aim study compare clinical outcome two group patient : patient receive arthroscopic transosseous fixation use ArthroTunneler tunnel device ( Tornier Inc , Edina , Minnesota ) versus patient receive arthroscopic rotator cuff repair use suture anchor .
DOC.brief_title: Arthroscopic Rotator Cuff Repair : Suture Anchors Versus Arthroscopic Transosseous Fixation
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 , < 65 Rotator cuff tear Patients give write informed consent BMI â‰¤ 33 Age > 65 , < 18 previous surgical intervention Informed consent accept Serious comorbidity Diabetes Metabolic Disorders Active infection Muscular Atrophy Biceps Tenodesis
